paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The most common TTR gene variants in patients with variant ATTR‐CM were V122I (p.V142I [n = 4]), I68L (p.I88L [n = 2]), and V30M (p.V50M [n = 2]).

variants.additional_notes: No individual-level penetrance data was provided.
key_quotes: The most common TTR gene variants in patients with variant ATTR‐CM were V122I (p.V142I [n = 4]), I68L (p.I88L [n = 2]), and V30M (p.V50M [n = 2]).

extraction_metadata.notes: No individual-level penetrance data was provided in the paper.
